page.title: 11HOME LIFE
page.content: Home life is very{tranquil}and at least half the people who live in the area do so from choice rather than necessity. But, lacking shops and other facilities of a town or larger village, we are forced to fall back on our own resources, at least growing our own vegetables or going further towards self-sufficiency by keeping chickens and making use of local grown fruit and vegetables for preserves and wine. Apart from{animals}for utilit- arian purposes, almost every household has at least one pet animal and most are multi cat/dog households. Labrador retrievers are the most popular breed of dog. The cats are divided into two groups household pets and semi-feral farm cats, but all do their share of reducing the enormous population of rabbits and small rodents. The proportion of horse riders is high.
